column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : What would be their motivation for doing something for society and not for themselves ?
#Text=Would there even be a motivation ?
#Text=PG : Oh , absolutely ! It ’s up for you to choose your own preferences .
#Text=By being self-centered you can select your own values .
#Text=DS : Like , I get value out of what I am doing for Wikimedia , even though it ’s for free , there is still a value …
#Text=PG : Absolutely !
#Text=What you ’re doing , David , is a Satanic example .

#Text=The whole point of Satanism is again to choose your values , and if you become somebody that really feels you want to work for hospitals for free — a number of our members work for animal organizations because we generally cherish animals and think they are far less polluted than people with values that are anti- their nature .
#Text=So , Satanists are often very giving .
#Text=Because our values come from the self , people who try to tell themselves that they must be selfless , they ca n't really understand why you would be giving if you ’re a selfish person .

#Text=But I think that ’s more a revelation of their own natures , meaning if they did n't have some external force making them being nice to people , they would be bastards ! We Satanists , because we are relaxed , we love our lives , we love people who enrich our lives and things that are around us that we enjoy , we can be really giving .
#Text=Gods can be beneficent !
#Text=So when you are your own God , you can be happy to give !
#Text=DS : How would a Satanist define evil ?
#Text=[ W]e believe that as animals that are social , we have a social contract .
#Text=When we deal with other people , our approach is that we want to have maximum freedom , and maximum responsibility without infringing on people as much as possible .
#Text=PG : Evil is whatever is harmful to you and the things you most cherish .
#Text=It 's that simple .
#Text=DS :
#Text=Some people have a compulsion to rape , and it harms them to not act upon it .
#Text=If it was harmful for somebody to not go out and rape somebody , how would a Satanist address that situation ?
#Text=PG : We then have to go into the realm of society , and we believe that as animals that are social , we have a social contract .
#Text=When we deal with other people , our approach is that we want to have maximum freedom , and maximum responsibility without infringing on people as much as possible .
#Text=So we would set up laws so we really do n't have to spend all of our time defending our territory , being in some kind of castle keep situation .

#Text=So anyone who is going to go out and assault undeserving people , is someone we would deem a criminal and have them locked up or dealt with in whatever way seems most appropriate , whether it ’s therapy , whether it ’s drugs , or if they ca n't control themselves , execution .
